Platte Valley School District is pleased to be introducing a new online registration process, frequently referred to as “OLR”, aimed to simplify and improve the convenience to families. All families must have a parent portal account through Infinite Campus in order to update your student’s information.

Online Registration will be available starting today August 4th. The “Online Registration” link will be available on the district website www.pvre7.org.

The district OLR page will have information and links for New and Returning students. There is also a FAQ section as well as an overview video.

An additional email will go out to any parent or guardian that currently does not have a Parent Portal account in our system. If you do not receive and email to set up your Parent Portal account, please contact your building to update your contact information and set up your Parent Portal Account.

Assistant Principal Tiffany Loeffler is also celebrating her 8th year with the district. She has a well founded background in instruction as well as counseling. She is also an excellent support to families and students.

The crooked hallway in Platte Valley Middle School is starting to look a bit different. Art teacher, Ms. Wendi Oster has begun a project with students called the "Legacy Mural."

The idea behind it is to "fill the crooked hallway almost like a subway channel, that celebrates the vibrant styles and voices of groups. . . The goal is to provide a trasnformative experience for the 8th graders to leave their mark on the school as well as encouraging and empowering the underclassmen until they get their chance to add."

The first group of students to work on a piece were Freshmen Karime Aguirre and Lillian Martinez. Going forward, there will be a group of 8th graders in the fall and a second group of 8th graders in the spring contributing to the project!
